remarks: Version of ~ cbv2h with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbv2hv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. y ps ) ) $.
bj-cbv2hv.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
bj-cbv2hv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
bj-cbv2hv $p |- ( A. x A. y ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
$d x y $.
